p: Figure 5b shows the fluorescence spectrum of tyrosinase presented a strong emission with maximum wavelength at 340 nm. With the addition of p‐CAEE to the tyrosinase solution, the fluorescence intensity reduced progressively. According to a previous study, the microenvironment of tryptophan influences the fluorescence intensity at fluorescence emission maximum wavelength (340 nm) (Yousefi et al., 2013). Therefore, our result indicates that p‐CAEE reduced the fluorescence intensity without changing the microenvironment of tyrosinase.
